short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Says a supportive phrase of either your choice, or selected from defaults

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you need a pick-me-up, or just need some kind words, Happy Helper can assist! The extension will display a random phrase when clicked, and can be customized to the user's liking.

- The "Important Links" tab has important resources
- Use the "Add New Phrase" button to add a new phrase for display

- Update (Version 3.3): 
* Set your preferences for how the message is displayed in the "Change Message Display Preferences" tab
